entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 near noon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
